name: Montezuma
overview: Improved graphics for the classic starred by Panama Joe, including animations and an ending screen. Inside a labyrinthine pyramid, Panama Joe will explore from room to room filled with enemies, obstacles, traps and dangers. The objective is to score points by gathering jewels along the way. Panama Joe must find keys to open doors, collect and use equipment such as torches, shields and amulets, without losing his life. Obstacles are laser gates, conveyor belts, disappearing floors and fire pits.
